long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Clicking “quote” opens the fast reply box with the quoted text.
* Fast reply box has quick formatting buttons like the main reply page does.
* Links are un-disguised so that you can easily read the target when you mouseover.  No more baseballthinkfactory.org URL prepended to them.
* Quoted posts have a toggle button on them to quickly collapse them.
* You can set a specific level of nested quotes to automatically collapse when the page loads.  For instance, if you set this to 2, the second quoted post will be automatically collapsed when the page loads.  This setting can be configured via the “Edit Lounge Prefences” link that appears at the bottom of the page when using the script.
